sqlite_interface module

class sqlite_interface.SqliteInterface(path: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: AddressDatabaseInterface

Interface for interacting with an SQLite database containing address information.

Variables:

  • __sql_path (str | None) – Path to the SQLite database file.

  • __squirrel_lite (SqliteDatabase | None) – SQLite database object.

  • __connection_open (bool) – Flag indicating whether the database connection is open.

Parameters:

path (str, optional) – Optional path to the SQLite database file.

update(_SqliteInterface__id: int, **kwargs) → int[source]

int

Raises:
